pyGLMcuda¶

A submodule containing the GLM GPU code.

class pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.GLM¶

Bases: pybind11_builtins.pybind11_object

add_block(self: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.GLM, arg0: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.TrialBlock) → int¶

Adds a block of trials to the current GLM object. Note: calls freeGPU() if data has been sent to the GPU already.

Parameters

block (pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.TrialBlock) – A set of trials to be placed on a single GPU.

Returns

Index of the block that was just added (will go 0, 1, 2, … as blocks are added)

Return type

block index (int)

Raises

ValueError – if trials in block do not match expected GLM structure

compute_log_likelihood(self: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.GLM, arg0: numpy.ndarray[numpy.float64]) → numpy.ndarray[numpy.float64]¶

Computes the log likelihood.

Parameters

K (np.ndarray) – [num_covariates] vector of parameters

Returns

[numTrials] the log likelihood for each trial

Return type

LL (np.ndarray)

compute_log_likelihood_grad(self: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.GLM, arg0: numpy.ndarray[numpy.float64]) → numpy.ndarray[numpy.float64]¶

Computes the gradient of log likelihood.

Parameters

K (np.ndarray) – [num_covariates] vector of parameters

Returns

[num_covariates]

Return type

G (np.ndarray)

compute_log_likelihood_hess(self: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.GLM, arg0: numpy.ndarray[numpy.float64]) → numpy.ndarray[numpy.float64]¶

Computes the Hessian of log likelihood.

Parameters

K (np.ndarray) – [num_covariates] vector of parameters

Returns

[num_covariates x num_covariates]

Return type

H (np.ndarray)

freeGPU(self: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.GLM) → None¶

Frees all values loaded to the GPU(s).

is_on_GPU(self: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.GLM) → bool¶

If the variables are loaded to the GPU or not.

Returns

(bool) True or false if on GPU(s).

toGPU(self: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.GLM) → None¶

Loads all the trial blocks that have been added to the GPU.

add_trial(self: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.TrialBlock, arg0: pyGMLM.pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.Trial) → int¶

Adds a trial of data to the current block.

Parameters

trial (pyGMLMcuda.kcGLM.Trial) – Object containing the trial’s data..

The trial index of the added trial (returns 0, 1, 2, … as trials are added)
